name: squad-protocol
description: Protocol for publishing and licensing IP using blockchain
author: Ezra Weller <ezra.weller@gmail.com>

scripts.up: yarn polywrap:up && yarn subgraph:up && yarn hardhat:deploy:local && yarn link-deps && yarn polywrap:deploy:local && yarn subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.down: yarn down:polywrap && yarn down:subgraph && yarn clean:volumes
scripts.clean: rm -f ./packages/hardhat/local-addresses.json ./packages/polywrap/recipes/constants.json && echo 'WARNING Not fully implemented, more to clean. check `docker volume ls`'
scripts.subgraph:deploy:local: yarn workspace @squad/subgraph build:all && yarn workspace @squad/subgraph deploy:local
scripts.test: yarn test:hardhat && yarn test:polywrap && yarn test:subgraph
